snippet: IAC, the Internet and media company founded by Barry Diller, plans to use a technique similar to its Match.com site to pair students with their ideal tutors.
abstract: IAC, the Internet and media company founded by Barry Diller, plans to use a technique similar to its Match.com site to pair students with their ideal tutors.

headline.main: IAC Is Set to Announce Acquisition of Tutor.com
headline.print_headline: IAC Is Set to Announce Acquisition of Tutor.com
